summary:
Analytic, fast thinking and looking for solutions. More a projectleader (inspirer of people) then a line manager. A good sense for politics as I advised politicians of different background (liberal, socialist, christian democrats). Active member of political Ombudsteam in Zwolle. 

Specialties:
Heritage policy
Financing heritage
Ombudsman work
